titles.title: Directing the Clerk of the House of Representatives to make corrections in the engrossment of H.R. 6201.
Emergency Paid Sick Leave Act
Second Coronavirus Preparedness and Response Supplemental Appropriations Act, 2020
Directing the Clerk of the House of Representatives to make corrections in the engrossment of H.R. 6201.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Appropriations, and in addition to the Committee on House Administration, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

Referred to the Committee on Appropriations, and in addition to the Committee on House Administration, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Without objection, the Chair laid before the House H. Res. 904.
RESERVATION OF OBJECTION - Mr. Gohmert reserved the right to object. Subsequently, his reservation was withdrawn.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

term.name: Emergency medical services and trauma care

bill.summary: This resolution directs the Clerk of the House of Representatives to make corrections in the engrossment of H.R. 6201 (Families First Coronavirus Response Act), including modifications to provisions regarding requirements and tax credits for paid sick leave.
